welcome_message_body: Welcome to Umraniye, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Trabzon Kültür Derneği
restaurants.description: Trabzon Kültür Derneği is a seafood restaurant located in İstanbul.
restaurants.address: Abdullahağa Mh Fıstıklı Mescit Sk No:5  Beylerbeyi, İstanbul

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Sabiha Gokcen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by Turkish Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Istanbul Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Istanbul Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in certain areas.
